column2: he accused-appellants, hereinafter referred to as the "appellants", were indicted in the High

column1: Court of Kandy on the following charge;

column2: Count 01:  that on or about 24.06.2012 at Udasgiriya in Matale within the jurisdiction
of Kandy High Court, you the above-named accused did commit rape on
Samaranayaka  contravening  the  section  364  (2)  (e)  as  amended  by  the
Amendment  Act  No.  22  of  1995  and  thereby  you  have  committed  an

column1: offence punishable under section 364 (2) of that Act.
